meanings.definition: Of or relating to any element with an atomic number greater than 92.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the transuranium elements in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Transuranium elements are heavier than uranium and thorium.
meanings.sent3: The transuranium party balloons floated higher than the regular ones.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were as rare and valuable as transuranium elements.
meanings.sent5: The transuranium glow of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.

meanings.sent1: The periodic table includes transuraniums like plutonium and neptunium.
meanings.sent2: Scientists have discovered new transuraniums in recent years.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret ingredient was a pinch of transuranium.
meanings.sent4: His voice was as powerful as a transuranium in the choir.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was said to contain a rare transuranium.
